Copilot Chat            Ctrl+Alt+i

Autoformat              Ctrl+Shift+i
Show Command Palette    Ctrl+Shift+P
Settings                Ctrl+,
Find                    Ctrl+Shift+F
Replace                 Ctrl+Shift+H

Debug
Start                   F5
Step  into/out          F11/Shift+F11
Step over               F10
Stio                    Shift+F5
